Bad Peterstal-Griesbach

The idyllic town Bad Peterstal-Griesbach is located in the Black Forest, in the upper Renchtal, where Rench, Bästenbächle and Freiersbach rush through narrow valleys and wooded mountains. Bad Peterstal-Griesbach is at 400 meter above sea level; surrounded by mountains that rise up to 900 meters, in close proximity to the Black Forest National Park.

from Tourist-Info Bad Peterstal-Griesbach, Premiumwanderort Bad Peterstal-Griesbach/Nationalparkregion Schwarzwald

Discover more

Holiday region: Bad Peterstal-Griesbach

The area gains its tranquility through the extensive meadows with many orchards, which are still tended by the farmers with a lot of manual labor. For centuries Bad Peterstal-Griesbach was famous for its healing springs as a “sophisticated” health resort, today it is a popular holiday destination for hikers and families.

Bad Peterstal-Griesbach also stands for a very special gourmet experience. A regional gourmet heaven opens up here, ranging from classic Baden cuisine to the star cuisine with which Martin Herrmann spoils guests in the LePavillon in the Hotel Dollenberg.

For those who enjoy the beauties of the upper Renchtal such as waterfalls, meadow valleys, impressive rock formations and rushing rivers. There are a number of interesting hiking tours available. They all have one thing in common: the good air in the Black Forest.

In to the wild!

National park Black Forest

Bad Peterstal-Griesbach is located in the national park Black Forest, from 400 to 1000 m above sea level. Deep valleys, small rivers and beautiful mountain landscape - a region full of stunning nature.

National Park · The Black Forest

Black Forest National Park

The Black Forest

The Black Forest National Park is an island of unspoilt nature. “Let nature be nature” is the goal. ...

Our tips for families

Trip planning

Weather

Sustainable tourism

Getting there

Public transport

Take the train from Offenburg or Appenweier to Bad Peterstal-Griesbach. The train is called Ortenau S-Bahn (OSB) and takes around 50 minutes.

https://www.ortenau-s-bahn.de

https://www.bahn.de/p/view/index.shtml

Directions

A5 motorway - Rheintalautobahn - to the exit Appenweier; from there approx. 30 kilometers on the B28 via Oberkirch and Oppenau to Bad Peterstal-Griesbach.

Motorway A81 - Bodenseeautobahn - to the exit Horb; from there continue on the B32, then B28 via Freudenstadt to Bad Peterstal-Griesbach, approx. 55 kilometers.

By plane

Do you want to come to the Black Forest by plane? The following airports are close by:

Aéroport International Strasbourg (Entfernung: 61 km)F-67960 Entzheim Internet: http://www.strasbourg.aeroport.fr/

Baden Airpark (Entfernung: 65 km)Flughafen Karlsruhe/Baden-BadenVictoria Boulevard A 10677836 Rheinmünster Internet: https://www.baden-airpark.de/

Flughafen Stuttgart (Entfernung: 109 km)Flughafen Stuttgart GmbHPostfach 23046170624 Stuttgart Internet: https://www.flughafen-stuttgart.de/?cl=de

EuroAirport Basel Mulhouse Freiburg (Entfernung: 159 km)Postfach 142CH-4030 Basel Internet: https://www.euroairport.com/de

Get there by train, car, bike, or on foot!
